description:
Stiff, light and damp, this all-mountain splitboard is the key to freeriding big mountain lines. Following a classic freeride shape and camber-dominant profile, the Seeker has camber underfoot, a longer reverse camber nose and a hefty 40mm stance setback. This is all designed to maintain float in deep snow and a provide reliable edgehold on crud.

  • Lightweight poplar wood core feels light underfoot, but has good shock absorption and stability
  • Polyamide top sheet sheds snow and is eco-friendly
  • Triaxial fibreglass offers a good balance of flex and torsional control
  • Freeride camber profile with flat to reverse camber in the tip and tail to maximize float and traditional caber underfoot to power thorough turns
  • Split-Tech touring bracket is moved forward which raises the nose for easier kick turns
  • ABS sidewall construction increases torsional stability
  • Sintered Durasurf 4001 base has great wax retention for a fast ride
name: Weston Seeker Splitboard - Unisex
